HomePage.toReadMe: Pour me lire, c'est par ici !

BiographyPage.title1: Why not treat yourself to the ultimate gift?
BiographyPage.block1: Writing your story is not just for celebrities or those who have lived through extraordinary events. It's for those who want to tell their story and pass it on, for those who want to overcome an ordeal, to turn the page. It's for your children, your family or your friends, to leave a trace. Or quite simply, for those who want to.
BiographyPage.block2: Whether you're ready to take the plunge or need more information, contact me! We'll arrange a no-obligation initial meeting. I'll explain how it works, and you can tell me all about your project over a coffee or on the phone.
BiographyPage.block3: What happens next? We choose together or not! Writing a book is a team effort. We take it one step at a time, meeting for one or two hours at a time. Before the next session, I write what you've given me, I show it to you and you correct anything you want! It's your story, and you remain in control of every character.
BiographyPage.block4: The price of a one-hour session includes 4 hours of writing, two return trips for your corrections and the insertion of photos if required. Please note that I don't transcribe your words directly, but I highlight them by adapting my writing style to your personality.
BiographyPage.block5: At 50 euros per hour, each session costs 250 euros. For a complete biography, 15 to 25 sessions are needed, compared with 5 to 15 for a slice of life. If you're as good at maths as my calculator, you'll have worked out that an average of 10 sessions costs €3,000.
BiographyPage.block6: Printing costs are not included in this simulation. Prices will depend on a number of factors, but on average you can expect to pay around €220 for 10 copies.
BiographyPage.title7: Write a slice of your life
BiographyPage.title8: Don't choose and write it all down!

CorrectionPage.block1: For professionals and private individuals alike!
CorrectionPage.internalCoherence: Internal coherence of the narrative, historical and geographical
CorrectionPage.rewording: Rewording if necessary in your writing style
CorrectionPage.block2: ALL OF THEM! We often think that proofreading is for correcting novels, plays, manuscripts or articles.
CorrectionPage.block3: In fact, any document containing words can be corrected: communication materials, company documents, CVs, covering letters, etc.
CorrectionPage.block4: Contact me to discuss your project!

InterpretariatPage.title1: Need an interpreter in France or abroad?
InterpretariatPage.block2: I'd be delighted to accompany you for all your events! I can travel anywhere in France and abroad, depending on my availability. Outside Nantes, the cost of travel will be added to the price of the service chosen.
InterpretariatPage.title2: What kinds of interpretations are possible?
InterpretariatPage.block3: I propose two types of interpretation:
InterpretariatPage.block4: consecutive interpretation: I speak after the speaker. The speaker's speech is fragmented. Interpreting only goes in one direction, English → French or Spanish → French.
InterpretariatPage.block5: bilateral interpreting: this is used during a discussion. I speak after the person but interpret in both directions, English ↔ French or Spanish ↔ French.
InterpretariatPage.block6: I don't (yet) do simultaneous or whispered interpreting.

WhoAmIPage.block1: After all, what if I gave a little of myself away too? With a passion for languages, cultures and literature, I took a degree in English and Spanish, followed by an international Masters in Health, Art and Culture.
WhoAmIPage.block2: My name is Jeanne and I'm a proofreader, biographer and interpreter!
WhoAmIPage.block3: After two missed opportunities to study in Mexico because of the pandemic and then drug trafficking, I finally managed to travel to Latin America! I went to Guatemala to work with the Armadillo puppet theatre association, which had already enabled me to work as an interpreter in France. The experience of discovering this continent and its people was a real eye-opener.
WhoAmIPage.block4: I continued my globe-trotting journey as far as Croatia. Welcomed by Médecins du Monde Belgium, I blossomed as a medical interpreter working with asylum seekers in a country I didn't know, had never even studied and yet was charmed by. I refuse to give it up completely and I still travel there today as a volunteer!
WhoAmIPage.block5: Taken up with studies and exploration, I put my passion for art, music and the stage on hold for a while. But now I'm back at it, and alongside my self-employed business I'm also training to be a musical actress.
WhoAmIPage.block6: My experiences as an interpreter have led me to meet people who have changed my life and my vision of the world.They have shown me that every journey in life deserves to be highlighted, to leave a mark. Writing the book of your life seems to me to be a very good way of doing that!

ContactPage.title1: How do I get in touch?
ContactPage.block1: I am at your disposal by email, telephone or on social networks via Instagram and LinkedIn. We can also meet up if you live in the Nantes region, or have a video chat!
ContactPage.block2: I can be reached on Instagram, LinkedIn, by email, by phone or via this contact form!

Form.messageCouldntSend: Oops. Unable to send your message. Please send it directly to jeanne.sabiron@prosae.net
